subject: Re: [junit] Methods that does not return value
msgSnippet: Can you test the behavior of whatever it is that reads the counter internally?  What is it supposed to do with this counter value? -Kevin (sorry if I ve missed
messageBody:

internally? What is it supposed to do with this counter value?
